Enumerate, Identify, Exploit

Xladius

Xladius performs realistic adversary simulation, full stack security assessments, vulnerability research.

Protecting Governments and Businesses from real world cyber threats

Cyber Security Advisory

We deliver vendor agnostic security services

Xladius conducts utlizses bleeding edge research and technology to deliver realistic adversery simulation and technical security assessments

The founder Jon Barg has extensive experience in penetration testing for governments and businesses in Europe and the Middle East

Research Focused

Xladius goal is to utilze the most modern hacking and pentesting techniques, to engage in commercial clients.

Out vision is, that only a security company that is activly research new technologies and attack vectors will be able to protect governments and businesses in the future.

Meat the team

main services

We deliver full stack security assessments

Application Security Assessments

Xladius Application Security Assessments utilize Application Penetration Tests and Code Review to ensure the security of your web or thick client applications. With methodologies that go far beyond the scanners or other off-the-shelf tools, Xladius performs manual, penetration tests to protect your company's secrets and interlectual property.

Infrastructure Security Assessments

We perform external and internal infrastructure VA/PTs. Placeat vel itaque perspiciatis sed repellat qui nihil recusandae doloremque aperiam necessitatibus aspernatur. illum ad adipisci saepe dolores cumque fugit nihil minus.

Red Team Security Assessments

By using real world attacks, Xladius performs Red Team engagements. These Adversary Attack Simulations, will simulate advanced attacks, simulating APT or targeted attack campaignes against government or businesses around the world.

IoT and ICS Security Assessments

Xladius delivers IoT and ICS secuirty assessments in Central Europe and the Middle East and covered a diverse range of Penetration Tests and Vulnerability Research against PLCs, HMIs, DCS, Field busses and other mission critical components. We bring extensive expertise in the power and electritity field, production and assembly, Industry 4.0 as well as Oil&Gas.

Vulnerability Research and Exploit Development

We strongly believe that active Vulnerability Research must be part of any effective security company. This allows our staff to develop custom tools and hacking techniques that will benefit our commercial projects directly.

Security Training

We share and educate people about comon security threats and hacking techniques. We are offering 3-5 day courses, that cover Web Application Security as well as binary exploitation trainings. In these trainings, the trainee will gain knowledge about cutting edge technologies and attack vectors used by advanced threats today.

The team

About Xladius

Jon Barg

Founder

As the founder and CEO of Xladius, and as an independent Security Research and Penetration Tester, he brings extensive expertise in technical security assessments for governments and busnisses around the globe. Jon brings 6+ years of experience as a Penetration Tester, holds OSCP and OSCE certification, and participated in several professional trainings and security conferences and identified multiple critical vulnerabilities in enterprise grade and custom build applications
